tokens.t: Elihu spake moreover, and said,

verses.plain: Thinkest thou this to be right, that thou saidst, My righteousness is more than God’s?

tokens.t: Thinkest thou this to be right,
thou saidst, My righteousness
more than God’s?

verses.plain: For thou saidst, What advantage will it be unto thee? and, What profit shall I have, if I be cleansed from my sin?

tokens.t: For thou saidst, What advantage will it be unto thee?
, What profit shall I have,
from my sin?

verses.plain: I will answer thee, and thy companions with thee.

tokens.t: I will answer thee, and thy companions with thee.

verses.plain: Look unto the heavens, and see; and behold the clouds which are higher than thou.

tokens.t: Look unto the heavens, and see; and behold the clouds
are higher than thou.

verses.plain: If thou sinnest, what doest thou against him? or if thy transgressions be multiplied, what doest thou unto him?

tokens.t: If thou sinnest, what doest thou against him? or
thy transgressions be multiplied, what doest thou unto him?

verses.plain: If thou be righteous, what givest thou him? or what receiveth he of thine hand?

tokens.t: If thou be righteous, what givest thou him? or what receiveth he of thine hand?

verses.plain: Thy wickedness may hurt a man as thou art; and thy righteousness may profit the son of man.

tokens.t: Thy wickedness
a man as thou
and thy righteousness
the son of man.

verses.plain: By reason of the multitude of oppressions they make the oppressed to cry: they cry out by reason of the arm of the mighty.

tokens.t: By reason of the multitude of oppressions they make
to cry: they cry out by reason of the arm of the mighty.

verses.plain: But none saith, Where is God my maker, who giveth songs in the night;

tokens.t: But none saith, Where
God my maker, who giveth songs in the night;

verses.plain: Who teacheth us more than the beasts of the earth, and maketh us wiser than the fowls of heaven?

tokens.t: Who teacheth us more than the beasts of the earth, and maketh us wiser than the fowls of heaven?

verses.plain: There they cry, but none giveth answer, because of the pride of evil men.

tokens.t: There they cry, but none giveth answer, because of the pride of evil men.

verses.plain: Surely God will not hear vanity, neither will the Almighty regard it.

tokens.t: Surely God will not hear vanity, neither will the Almighty regard it.

verses.plain: Although thou sayest thou shalt not see him, yet judgment is before him; therefore trust thou in him.

tokens.t: Although thou sayest thou shalt not see him,
judgment
before him; therefore trust thou in him.

verses.plain: But now, because it is not so, he hath visited in his anger; yet he knoweth it not in great extremity:

tokens.t: But now, because
not
, he hath visited in his anger; yet he knoweth
not in great extremity:

verses.plain: Therefore doth Job open his mouth in vain; he multiplieth words without knowledge.

tokens.t: Therefore doth Job open his mouth in vain; he multiplieth words without knowledge.

footnotes.text: if…: or, by it more than by my sin
answer…: Heb. return to thee words
he hath: that is, God hath
he knoweth: that is, Job knoweth
